news.title: Trump considering 11 candidates for Fed chair, including David Zervos and Rick Rieder, sources say
news.summary: The size of the Fed Chair candidate list and the process described suggest a decision is not imminent. A decision could take a considerable amount of time.

news.title: How Big Tech is paying its way out of Trump's tariffs
news.summary: The deals show just how important it is for the world's largest companies to find some tariff relief. Analysts say the deals show how important tariff relief is to the global economy.

news.title: Weekly mortgage refinancing demand shoots 23% higher, with riskier loans making a comeback
news.summary: Mortgage rates dropped again last week, spurring big demand for mortgage refinancing. ARM loans also increased, as they offer lower rates.

news.title: Trump tells Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon to replace bank's economist over tariff predictions
news.summary: President Donald Trump said Goldman Sachs boss David Solomon should "just focus on being a DJ" if he does not get a new economist. Trump said Solomon should get a job as a DJ instead of an economist.

news.title: Jim Cramer's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Wednesday
news.summary: Wait for the CoreWeave lockup to expire, and major insider buying at Club name Eli Lilly. The lockup is set to expire at the end of the month.

news.title: ​Trump has perfected a tax on corporate America — just don’t call it a tax. Here’s how it could affect stocks.
news.summary: Trump’s Nvidia deal opens a multibillion-dollar  ‘pay to play’ floodgate to do business. If you can’t afford the toll, don't approach the booth.

news.title: Hims & Hers CEO sells $33 million in stock after a massive rally
news.summary: The company says the sales came from indirect holdings and were for “tax and philanthropic purposes.” The company says it sold the shares for tax and philanthropy purposes.

news.title: Chili’s parent offers fresh sign that consumers are still eating out. The stock surges.
news.summary: Brinker's stock surges, as the Chili's as strong traffic growth led to better-than-expected quarterly sales. Brinker’s stock surges.

news.title: Perplexity wants to buy Google Chrome. Wall Street dismisses the notion as a stunt.
news.summary: AI startup has put in a $34.5 billion bid to buy Chrome as a key antitrust ruling looms. But analysts say the price looks low and Google is unlikely to be selling.

news.title: Why Deutsche Bank says it’s time to short the 10-year Treasury
news.summary: Market is overestimating how far the Fed will cut rates, analysts say. The Fed is expected to cut rates by a quarter of a percentage point in December.
